CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Because of the threedimensional structure of spirobifluorene units , PSFDTBT is readily dissolved in common organic solvents such as chloroform , chlorobenzene , toluene , THF , 1,2-dichlorobenzene ( DCB ) , 1,2,4-trichlorobenzene ( TCB ) , etc.

Let's think step by step.

1. Spirobifluorene
2. Chloroform
3. Chlorobenzene
4. Toluene
5. Tetrahydrofuran (THF)
6. 1,2-Dichlorobenzene (DCB)
7. 1,2,4-Trichlorobenzene (TCB)

These are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph. They are all chemical compounds mentioned as being suitable solvents for dissolving PSFDTBT.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Spirobifluorene
2. Chloroform
3. Chlorobenzene
4. Toluene
5. Tetrahydrofuran (THF)
6. 1,2-Dichlorobenzene (DCB)
7. 1,2,4-Trichlorobenzene (TCB)

I have removed any entities that do not clearly refer to Material Names. The remaining entities are all chemical compounds mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Spirobifluorene |
| Chloroform |
| Chlorobenzene |
| Toluene |
| Tetrahydrofuran (THF) |
| 1,2-Dichlorobenzene (DCB) |
| 1,2,4-Trichlorobenzene (TCB) |
